Class AbstractMenu

extends java.awt.Container
implements SpritelessElement

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addSpritelessElement(SpritelessElement menuElement)
      Adds an SpritelessElement to the menu
      void changeToMenuPosition(SpritelessElement menuElement)
      Takes the original position of the SpritelessElement and changes it to be relative to the menu's position If a SpritelessElement has position (30, 40) and the menu has Position (50, 50), the SpritelessElement now has position (80, 90)

      Disables the AbstractMenu

      • changeToMenuPosition

        public void changeToMenuPosition(SpritelessElement menuElement)
        Takes the original position of the SpritelessElement and changes it to be relative to the menu's position If a SpritelessElement has position (30, 40) and the menu has Position (50, 50), the SpritelessElement now has position (80, 90)
        Parameters:
        menuElement - the SpritelessElement to have its position changed
